<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af269b990800f72c7cf535c407e8e639ba0d4fd3b1a2d5d46d77b66d5a35783580">MachineOperand::MO&#95;ConstantPoolIndex</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af269b990800f72c7cf535c407e8e639baa1741ad7465d81fb3020b84c390ee49d">MachineOperand::MO&#95;JumpTableIndex</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">llvm::hash&#95;value</a>(MO);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We could explicitly handle all the types of the MachineOperand,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// here but we can just return a common number until we find a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compelling test case where this is bad. The only side effect here</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is contributing to a hash collision but there&#39;s enough information</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (Opcodes,other registers etc) that this will likely not be a problem.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Handle the following Index/ID/Predicate cases. They can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be hashed on in a stable manner.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af269b990800f72c7cf535c407e8e639ba0270d8f468e7b92dafb486293ecf137d">MachineOperand::MO&#95;CFIIndex</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af269b990800f72c7cf535c407e8e639ba9f104d16987b5384042276466fc2e003">MachineOperand::MO&#95;IntrinsicID</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af269b990800f72c7cf535c407e8e639ba3ab395cc24292a5e8e499e48f1553d94">MachineOperand::MO&#95;Predicate</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the cases below we havn&#39;t found a way to produce an artifact that will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// result in a stable hash, in most cases because they are pointers. We want</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VRegRenamer::createVirtualRegister(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#ac6bf744f357352cde7578931007c0b6f">Register::isVirtualRegister</a>(VReg) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected Virtual Registers&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/graphprogram/#a0ad4685976f8c4d4a697a53fbe05d10b">Name</a> = getInstructionOpcodeHash(&#42;MRI.getVRegDef(VReg));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> createVirtualRegisterWithLowerName(VReg, Name);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VRegRenamer::renameInstsInMBB(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;NamedVReg&gt; VRegs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#afcbd4ecc474e2d218391d6d3027b086aa7861ef1db44eac8ea7a373cd7c53a7c5">Prefix</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;bb&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> + std::to&#95;string(CurrentBBNumber) + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#95;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MachineInstr &amp;Candidate : &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t rename stores/branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Candidate.mayStore() || Candidate.isBranch())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Candidate.getNumOperands())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for instructions that define VRegs in operand 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MachineOperand &amp;MO = Candidate.getOperand(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid non regs, instructions defining physical regs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>() || !MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#ab203bbcbc320180b1da9e9a92ee0c784">isVirtual</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    VRegs.push&#95;back(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NamedVReg(MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>(), Prefix + getInstructionOpcodeHash(Candidate)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VRegs.size() ? doVRegRenaming(getVRegRenameMap(VRegs)) : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a479b1f65525d3585f951deced4db0e36">false</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VRegRenamer::createVirtualRegisterWithLowerName(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VReg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string LowerName = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/graphprogram/#a0ad4685976f8c4d4a697a53fbe05d10b">Name</a>.lower();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetRegisterClass &#42;RC = MRI.getRegClassOrNull(VReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RC ? MRI.createVirtualRegister(RC, LowerName)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">            : MRI.createGenericVirtualRegister(MRI.getType(VReg), LowerName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
